title: Mori no Hotori de Jam wo Niru: Isekai de Hajimeru Slow Life
original_name: 森のほとりでジャムを煮る ～異世界ではじめる田舎暮らし〈スローライフ〉～
sinopse: After an accident, a young woman has been transported to another world. This world gave her everything she was waiting for: a healthy and delicious life, while living in the countryside! Like a grandma for her children, she decides to start making jams for everyone, and to enjoy her brand new life.
